name: Juicy Breakout

code.description: All C# scripts for game logic, juice systems, and UI

tasks.name: GameEvents.cs
tasks.description: Static event hub for all game events (OnBrickHit, OnBallLost, etc.)

tasks.name: Ball.cs
tasks.description: Ball movement, collision, squash/stretch, trail attachment

tasks.name: Paddle.cs
tasks.description: Paddle input (mouse + keyboard), movement, squash on direction change

tasks.name: Brick.cs
tasks.description: Brick types (Standard/Tough/Hard/Unbreakable), health, damage, destruction

tasks.name: GameManager.cs
tasks.description: Game states, lives, level management, brick grid spawning

tasks.name: ComboSystem.cs
tasks.description: Combo tracking, reset on paddle hit, multiplier calculation

tasks.name: ScoreManager.cs
tasks.description: Score tracking, high score, score events

tasks.name: ScreenShaker.cs
tasks.description: Camera shake with Perlin noise, intensity/duration, additive stacking

tasks.name: HitPauseController.cs
tasks.description: Time.timeScale manipulation for freeze frames

tasks.name: ParticleController.cs
tasks.description: Spawn particles for trail, destruction, sparks

tasks.name: JuiceOrchestrator.cs
tasks.description: Coordinates all juice: subscribes to events, triggers effects

tasks.name: AudioManager.cs
tasks.description: Play sounds with pitch/volume variation, combo escalation

tasks.name: GameHUD.cs
tasks.description: UI controller for score, combo, lives display

tasks.name: ScorePopup.cs
tasks.description: Floating +points text that rises and fades

tasks.name: Iteration2LifetimeScope.cs
tasks.description: VContainer DI setup for all services

audio.description: Generate all sound effects via ElevenLabs

tasks.name: paddle_hit.wav
tasks.description: Satisfying thwack sound when ball hits paddle

tasks.name: brick_hit.wav
tasks.description: Crack/chip sound when brick takes damage

tasks.name: brick_destroy.wav
tasks.description: Glass/crystal shatter when brick destroyed

tasks.name: wall_bounce.wav
tasks.description: Soft ping when ball hits wall

tasks.name: combo_up.wav
tasks.description: Rising positive tone for combo increment

tasks.name: ball_lost.wav
tasks.description: Negative buzz/thud when ball falls

tasks.name: level_clear.wav
tasks.description: Victory fanfare jingle

tasks.name: launch.wav
tasks.description: Whoosh sound when ball launches

scene.description: Scene setup, prefabs, materials, particles, UI canvas

tasks.name: Create Iteration2Scene
tasks.description: New scene with 2D camera (orthographic size 6), directional light

tasks.name: Create boundaries
tasks.description: Wall colliders (left, right, top) and death zone (bottom) with tags

tasks.name: Create Ball prefab
tasks.description: Circle sprite, Rigidbody2D, CircleCollider2D, Ball script, TrailRenderer

tasks.name: Create Paddle prefab
tasks.description: Rounded rect sprite, Rigidbody2D kinematic, BoxCollider2D, Paddle script

tasks.name: Create Brick prefabs
tasks.description: 4 brick types with colors (blue/green/orange/gray), BoxCollider2D, Brick script

tasks.name: Create particle prefabs
tasks.description: BallTrail, BrickDestruction, PaddleSparks, WallSparks particle systems

tasks.name: Setup UI Canvas
tasks.description: Canvas with Score, Combo, Lives, game state text elements

tasks.name: Create materials
tasks.description: Sprite materials with appropriate shaders for glow effects

tasks.name: Setup post-processing
tasks.description: URP Volume with Bloom, Chromatic Aberration, Vignette

tasks.name: Wire up GameManager
tasks.description: Add GameManager, JuiceOrchestrator, AudioManager to scene, assign references
